name: Find Jesus
description: Find a depiction of jesus. The depiction must clearly be jesus.

name: Get Boba
description: Get boba or bubble tea. It must be advertised as boba or bubble tea.

name: Touch grass
description: Touch real grass.

name: Rock paper scissors
description: Find a rock larger than your fist, a blank piece of paper, and a pair of scissors.

name: Find something expensive
description: Find something being sold for more than $1000. The thing must be physically present and something you could hold with one hand.

name: Bowl a strike
description:
Set up 9 objects in a triangle. Throw 1 object from at least metre away.
Knock down all 9 objects with the thrown object.

name: Write an ode to another team
description: Write a poem celebrating another team. The poem must contain rhymes for each of the other team’s names.

name: Find something from your tattoo
description:
Find something that a team member has a tattoo of.
The thing must be physical and the main subject of the tattoo.
If nobody on your team has a tattoo, find a tattoo studio and find something depicted there.

name: Seek revenge
description: Eat something that is served cold. It must be served below room temperature.

name: Shhhh!
description:
Nobody in your team may speak for ten minutes.
Film yourselves the entire time.

name: Find hide
description: Find something made of real leather, animal skin or fur.

name: Become camouflaged
description: Take a photo where the colour of each item of clothing you are wearing matches the colour of its background.

name: Leave a trail of breadcrumbs
description: Drop breadcrumbs in three different locations.

name: Hide the pain
description: Smile for the next 5 minutes. You must film yourself smiling the entire time.

name: Build a tower
description:
Using objects you find, make a tower that is at least 1 meter tall.
Your tower must contain at least 3 items. None of the items may be more than 50 cm tall.

name: Find a cat
description: Find a real cat.

name: Write “We are here”
description:
Write the words “We are here”.
The words must be at least one metre across in total.

name: Stalk a bird
description: Film a bird for 1 minute. You must keep the bird on camera the entire time.

name: Become hidden figures
description: Multiply your distance from the Planetarium by your distance from the Sun Life Building. Share that number.

name: Eat sardines
description:
Eat a real sardine.
If both team members do not eat fish, find a sardine and write a poem about it.

name: Secret tunnel, through the mountain
description:
Go underground.
Underground means:
Below the surface level of all of the surrounding ground area

Enclosed on all four sides and above

No natural light is visible

name: Hide in Plane Sight
description: Spot an aeroplane.

name: Play catch
description: Throw an object at least 10 metres between team members 5 times in a row without the object touching the ground.
